trans-unit.source: Provides markup compile and tools support for named XAML elements and for attaching event handlers to them.
trans-unit.target: 對具名 XAML 項目提供標記編譯及工具支援，以便將事件處理常式附加至這些項目。

trans-unit.source: This interface is used internally by <xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會在內部使用<xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A> are widely observable as part of the infrastructure provided by frameworks or technologies that use XAML combined with application and programming models.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A>廣泛 observable 提供架構的基礎結構的一部分或使用 XAML 的技術結合的應用程式和程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: For example, whenever you look at the generated classes for XAML root elements in WPF pages and applications, you will see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A> defined in the output.
trans-unit.target: 例如，每當您查看 WPF 網頁和應用程式中的 XAML 根項目所產生的類別時，您會看到<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A>輸出中所定義。

trans-unit.source: That method also exists in the compiled assembly and plays a role in the WPF application model of loading the XAML UI content at XAML parse time.
trans-unit.target: 該方法也會編譯的組件存在，而且是在 XAML 剖析階段載入 XAML 內容的 WPF 應用程式模型中扮演一個角色。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the WPF integration of the `InitializeComponent` concept, see [Application Management Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md) or [Code-Behind and XAML in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 WPF 整合`InitializeComponent`概念，請參閱[應用程式管理概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md)或[程式碼後置中和 XAML WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個介面會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector>位於 System.Xaml 組件中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: A failure to resolve <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector> during an attempted build is often an indicator that you have not updated your WPF project correctly.
trans-unit.target: 無法解析<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector>嘗試建置期間通常是您沒有已正確更新 WPF 專案的指標。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the project is not referencing the System.Xaml assembly for a project that targets [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 專案未參考 System.Xaml 組件為目標的專案，特別是， [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Try running the `devenv /upgrade` option for the project, or otherwise adjust the project assembly references so that System.Xaml is in the reference list.
trans-unit.target: 請嘗試執行`devenv /upgrade`選項的專案，或使 System.Xaml 的參考清單中調整專案的組件參考。

trans-unit.source: An identifier token to distinguish calls.
trans-unit.target: 要區分呼叫的識別項語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The target to connect events and names to.
trans-unit.target: 要連接事件和名稱的目標。

trans-unit.source: Attaches events and names to compiled content.
trans-unit.target: 附加事件和名稱至編譯內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector> is used internally by <xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector> 會在內部使用<xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the compiled page of a component.
trans-unit.target: 載入元件的已編譯網頁。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector> is used internally by <xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector> 會在內部使用<xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A> are widely observable as part of the infrastructure provided by frameworks or technologies that use XAML combined with application and programming models.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A>廣泛 observable 提供架構的基礎結構的一部分或使用 XAML 的技術結合的應用程式和程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: For example, whenever you look at the generated classes for XAML root elements in WPF pages and applications, you will see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A> defined in the output.
trans-unit.target: 例如，每當您查看 WPF 網頁和應用程式中的 XAML 根項目所產生的類別時，您會看到<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector.InitializeComponent%2A>輸出中所定義。

trans-unit.source: That method also exists in the compiled assembly and plays a role in the WPF application model of loading the XAML UI content at XAML parse time.
trans-unit.target: 該方法也會編譯的組件存在，而且是在 XAML 剖析階段載入 XAML 內容的 WPF 應用程式模型中扮演一個角色。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the WPF integration of the `InitializeComponent` concept, see [Application Management Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md) or [Code-Behind and XAML in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 WPF 整合`InitializeComponent`概念，請參閱[應用程式管理概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md)或[程式碼後置中和 XAML WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md)。
